channel.title: Whonix 16.0.5.0 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes * Whonix-Gateway * updated Tor to version 0.4.7.7 * install [tor-ctrl](https://github.com/Kicksecure/tor-ctrl) by @nyxnor by default * Tor drop-in config snipppet `/etc/torrc.d/*.conf` and `/usr/local/etc/torrc.d/*.conf` * Tor Control Panel / Anon Connection Wizard: updated default built-in bridges (source: Tor Browser) * Whonix-Workstation * updated Tor Browser to version 11.0.13 * updated Monero to version 0.17.3.2 * improved Whonix Welcome Page * [`repository-dist`](https://github.com/kicksecure/repository-dist) (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository) (https://forums.whonix.org/t/tool-to-onionize-all-apt-sources/13367) * has a new `--transport` command line parameter (Thanks to @nyxnor!) * `--transport plain-tls` * `--transport plain-tls-tor` * `--transport onion` * (`--transport onion-tls` ([unavailable because...](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Privacy_Policy_Technical_Details#Onion_TLS))) * split, separated Kicksecure and Whonix source code * https://github.com/Kicksecure * https://github.com/Whonix * [derivative-maker](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Dev/Derivative-Maker) (build Kicksecure and/or Whonix from source code)
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
* https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Stable_Release * https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stable_Release
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/derivative-maker/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.4.2-developers-only...16.0.5.0-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.5.0 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 2 Dec 21

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Kicksecure – 24 Mar 22

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • Whonix-Gateway
    • updated Tor to version 0.4.7.7
    • install tor-ctrl by @nyxnor by default
    • Tor drop-in config snipppet /etc/torrc.d/*.conf and /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/*.conf
    • Tor Control Panel / Anon Connection Wizard: updated default built-in bridges (source: Tor Browser)
  • Whonix-Workstation
    • updated Tor Browser to version 11.0.13
    • updated Monero to version 0.17.3.2
    • improved Whonix Welcome Page
  • repository-dist (Whonix ™ APT Repository) (tool to onionize all APT sources)
    • has a new --transport command line parameter (Thanks to @nyxnor!)
      • --transport plain-tls
      • --transport plain-tls-tor
      • --transport onion
      • (--transport onion-tls (unavailable because…))
  • split, separated Kicksecure and Whonix source code
    • Kicksecure · GitHub
    • Whonix · GitHub
    • derivative-maker (build Kicksecure and/or Whonix from source code)

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 15 Mar 22

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 5 Jun 22

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

  • Stable Release - Kicksecure
  • Stable Release - Whonix

Full difference of all changes

Comparing 16.0.4.2-developers-only...16.0.5.0-developers-only · derivative-maker/derivative-maker · GitHub
